boat.name: Blue Note
boat.full_description:
'Blue Note' is an East Coast Smacks Boat, 12', standing lug sail on an unstayed mast, built by Brian Kennell in 2013.

She has a GRP hull made from a mould taken from an original smack's boat built by Alf Last of Maldon around 1970.
boat.construction_details: GRP, mould taken from Alf Last design. Fitted out in wood with galvanised centreboard.
boat.short_description: 'Blue Note' is a replica of an East Coast smack's boat, 12' length, sail area 7.1 sq m. Built by Brian Kennel in 2013.

for_sales.sales_text:
"Blue Note" is an East Coast Smacks Boat, 12", standing lug sail on an unstayed mast. Professionally built by Brian Kennell in 2013. Clipper canvas sail from North Sea Sails. All in almost new condition as little used and stored in garage every winter.

Sale includes boat cover, galvanised combi trailer and light bar, two new oars, fenders, anchor with warp and chain, and an old Yamaha 2HP outboard (winterised for several years).

Total cost in 2013 was Â£7,000.

For more details visit Anglia Yacht Brokers
